frontmatter.title: The BI Triangle: A Key to Great Wealth.
frontmatter.short: The BI Triangle has the power to turn ordinary ideas into great fortune.   A business can have both a spiritual and a business mission to be successful. There are many people with great ideas, but few people with great fortune.
frontmatter.keywords: Rich Dad, BI Triangle, business intelligence reporting, data driven decision making, data driven decisions, using data to make decisions
frontmatter.hero_alt: The BI Triangle: A Key to Great Wealth.
